summary: This is a brief email correspondence from July 27, 2019, regarding a suicide watch and psychological observation update for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It confirms he was under observation on the morning of his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by number #76318-054 who was under suicide watch and psychological observation on July 27, 2019.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update for Epstein
events.description: A psychological observation update was conducted for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, confirming he was under suicide watch on the morning of July 27, 2019.

keyFacts: The document is dated July 27, 2019, the morning of Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It confirms Jeffrey Epstein (inmate #76318-054) was under suicide watch and psychological observation.
The correspondence is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY document set.
